data.content: Both surveys were conducted using comparable methodologies.
Both surveys were conducted using the same methodology, but the extent of the areas covered differ by 10% or more.
The most recent survey uses a different survey methodology, or replaces a guess.
A new entry into the AED, i.e. no previous survey or guess to compare with.
The population is known to have disappeared from the site, be it through translocation or local extinction.
A guess replaces an older guess or a survey estimate that has been downgraded to the category of OTHER GUESSES for being more than 10 years old.
Data from previous report has been re-analyzed or re-interpreted in the light of new information other than a new estimate.
The estimate in the previous report has been downgraded to the category of OTHER GUESSES for being more than 10 years old.
The estimate has been retained unchanged from previous report.
